org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster

接口 JobMasterGateway

  • 所有超级接口:
    CheckpointCoordinatorGateway, FencedRpcGateway<JobMasterId>, RpcGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    JobMaster

    public interface JobMasterGateway
extends CheckpointCoordinatorGateway, FencedRpcGateway<JobMasterId>
    JobMaster rpc gateway interface

    • 方法详细资料

      • cancel

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> cancel(Time timeout)
        Cancels the currently executed job.
        参数:
        timeout - of this operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge of the operation

      • stop

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> stop(Time timeout)
        Cancel the currently executed job.
        参数:
        timeout - of this operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the cancellation was successful

      • updateTaskExecutionState

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> updateTaskExecutionState(TaskExecutionState taskExecutionState)
        Updates the task execution state for a given task.
        参数:
        taskExecutionState - New task execution state for a given task
        返回:
        Future flag of the task execution state update result

      • requestNextInputSplit

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<SerializedInputSplit> requestNextInputSplit(JobVertexID vertexID,
                                                                                   ExecutionAttemptID executionAttempt)
        Requests the next input split for the ExecutionJobVertex. The next input split is sent back to the sender as a SerializedInputSplit message.
        参数:
        vertexID - The job vertex id
        executionAttempt - The execution attempt id
        返回:
        The future of the input split. If there is no further input split, will return an empty object.

      • requestPartitionState

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ExecutionState> requestPartitionState(IntermediateDataSetID intermediateResultId,
                                                                             ResultPartitionID partitionId)
        Requests the current state of the partition. The state of a partition is currently bound to the state of the producing execution.
        参数:
        intermediateResultId - The execution attempt ID of the task requesting the partition state.
        partitionId - The partition ID of the partition to request the state of.
        返回:
        The future of the partition state

      • scheduleOrUpdateConsumers

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> scheduleOrUpdateConsumers(ResultPartitionID partitionID,
                                                                              Time timeout)
        Notifies the JobManager about available data for a produced partition.

        There is a call to this method for each ExecutionVertex instance once per produced ResultPartition instance, either when first producing data (for pipelined executions) or when all data has been produced (for staged executions).

        The JobManager then can decide when to schedule the partition consumers of the given session.

        参数:
        partitionID - The partition which has already produced data
        timeout - before the rpc call fails
        返回:
        Future acknowledge of the schedule or update operation

      • disconnectTaskManager

        void disconnectTaskManager(ResourceID resourceID,
                           java.lang.Exception cause)
        Disconnects the given TaskExecutor from the JobMaster.
        参数:
        resourceID - identifying the TaskManager to disconnect
        cause - for the disconnection of the TaskManager

      • disconnectResourceManager

        void disconnectResourceManager(ResourceManagerId resourceManagerId,
                               java.lang.Exception cause)
        Disconnects the resource manager from the job manager because of the given cause.
        参数:
        resourceManagerId - identifying the resource manager leader id
        cause - of the disconnect

      • lookupKvStateLocation

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<KvStateLocation> lookupKvStateLocation(java.lang.String registrationName)
        Requests a KvStateLocation for the specified InternalKvState registration name.
        参数:
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered.
        返回:
        Future of the requested InternalKvState location

      • notifyKvStateRegistered

        void notifyKvStateRegistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId,
                             KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange,
                             java.lang.String registrationName,
                             KvStateID kvStateId,
                             java.net.InetSocketAddress kvStateServerAddress)
        Notifies that queryable state has been registered.
        参数:
        jobVertexId - JobVertexID the KvState instance belongs to.
        keyGroupRange - Key group range the KvState instance belongs to.
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered.
        kvStateId - ID of the registered KvState instance.
        kvStateServerAddress - Server address where to find the KvState instance.

      • notifyKvStateUnregistered

        void notifyKvStateUnregistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId,
                               KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange,
                               java.lang.String registrationName)
        Notifies that queryable state has been unregistered.
        参数:
        jobVertexId - JobVertexID the KvState instance belongs to.
        keyGroupRange - Key group index the KvState instance belongs to.
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered.

      • requestClassloadingProps

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ClassloadingProps> requestClassloadingProps()
        Request the classloading props of this job.

      • offerSlots

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<SlotOffer>> offerSlots(ResourceID taskManagerId,
                                                                                   java.lang.Iterable<SlotOffer> slots,
                                                                                   Time timeout)
        Offers the given slots to the job manager. The response contains the set of accepted slots.
        参数:
        taskManagerId - identifying the task manager
        slots - to offer to the job manager
        timeout - for the rpc call
        返回:
        Future set of accepted slots.

      • failSlot

        void failSlot(ResourceID taskManagerId,
              AllocationID allocationId,
              java.lang.Exception cause)
        Fails the slot with the given allocation id and cause.
        参数:
        taskManagerId - identifying the task manager
        allocationId - identifying the slot to fail
        cause - of the failing

      • registerTaskManager

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RegistrationResponse> registerTaskManager(java.lang.String taskManagerRpcAddress,
                                                                                 TaskManagerLocation taskManagerLocation,
                                                                                 Time timeout)
        Registers the task manager at the job manager.
        参数:
        taskManagerRpcAddress - the rpc address of the task manager
        taskManagerLocation - location of the task manager
        timeout - for the rpc call
        返回:
        Future registration response indicating whether the registration was successful or not

      • heartbeatFromTaskManager

        void heartbeatFromTaskManager(ResourceID resourceID)
        Sends the heartbeat to job manager from task manager
        参数:
        resourceID - unique id of the task manager

      • heartbeatFromResourceManager

        void heartbeatFromResourceManager(ResourceID resourceID)
        Sends heartbeat request from the resource manager
        参数:
        resourceID - unique id of the resource manager

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<JobDetails> requestJobDetails(Time timeout)
        Request the details of the executed job.
        参数:
        timeout - for the rpc call
        返回:
        Future details of the executed job

      • requestArchivedExecutionGraph

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> requestArchivedExecutionGraph(Time timeout)
        Request the ArchivedExecutionGraph of the currently executed job.
        参数:
        timeout - for the rpc call
        返回:
        Future archived execution graph derived from the currently executed job

      • requestJobStatus

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<JobStatus> requestJobStatus(Time timeout)
        Requests the current job status.
        参数:
        timeout - for the rpc call
        返回:
        Future containing the current job status
